description:
Factory, a startup founded in 2023 with the aim of eliminating traditional software development bottlenecks, is leveraging reasoning models from OpenAI to streamline and optimise the creation and maintenance of software. The Factory Platform integrates OpenAI’s o1, o3-mini, and GPT-4o models directly into its workflows, creating a development environment that transcends simple code generation. Instead,... Read more »

The post OpenAI models power faster, smarter code development appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: OpenAI models power faster, smarter code development
